entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:10 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 9:59 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: E 15 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
